data.actual_result: The app navigates one step back to the user profile you visited before. (However, if you then press back, you are in the correct server)
data.expected_result: The app should navigate back to the chat
data.short_description: When navigating in the user profile, clicking a mutual server does not navigate the activity stack properly.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open user profile for someone and click mutual friends - Click any friend and select mutual servers - Click any server
